entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 70. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
